author: Shawna Chen
title: White House asks Congress for $6.4 billion to aid Ukraine
description: The money would go toward security assistance, humanitarian aid and efforts to counter Russian cyberattacks, among other things.
content:
The Biden administration has asked Congress to provide $6.4 billion in funding to assist Ukraine as it fights off Russia's advances, an administration official confirmed to Axios on Friday.
